name: Tower Defence Prototype (SimenF)
description:
Install instructions

Extract all files from the zipped file into a new folder where you want to store the game on your computer. After you have extracted the files, run the GAD03 Application and the game should start. After you have tried out the game, please fill in this small question form if you could https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSd-xspY1ighzzkYJ21QJjY_iWWLMVLc_lAgWTzC...
